name: Arma: Cold War Assault
description: Standalone v1.99 for owners of Operation Flashpoint (original, Gold or GOTY). This downloads and installs the last version, Arma: CWA v1.99 published by Bohemia. You just need to enter your CD key during the setup.

script.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Bohemia Interactive/Arma Cold War Assault/ColdWarAssaultPreferences.exe

content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/Bohemia Interactive/Arma Cold War Assault/ColdWarAssaultPreferences.exe
files:
- file1: http://lutris.net/files/games/arma-cold-war-assault/arma-cwa-1.99.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/installer/arma-cold-war-assault
    file: file1
- task:
    executable: $CACHE/installer/arma-cold-war-assault/CWA.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
